channel.title: Wetzel Co Emergency Management | New Martinsville WV | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/WCOEM/

item.title: Leak has been located and repairs are in process. Boil order
item.description: Leak has been located and repairs are in process. Boil order until further notice.Leak has been located and repairs are in process. Boil order until further notice.

item.title: ATTENTION! Please conserve on water!! We are currently tryin
item.description: ATTENTION! Please conserve on water!! We are currently trying to find the problem and will update more at a later time!ATTENTION! Please conserve on water!! We are currently trying to find the problem and will update more at a later time!

item.title: Wetzel County is now half in extreme drought and half in sev
item.description: Wetzel County is now half in extreme drought and half in severe drought. Please be careful burning. Wetzel County is now half in extreme drought and half in severe drought. Please be careful burning.
